trans-unit.source: Common base class and contract for DataSourceProvider objects, which are factories that execute some queries to produce a single object or a list of objects that you can use as binding source objects.
trans-unit.target: 公共基类和协定 DataSourceProvider 对象，后者是执行某些查询以生成单个对象或对象可以用作绑定源对象的列表的工厂。

trans-unit.source: DataSourceProvider is a convenience wrapper around an existing data model; it does not replace any data model.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceProvider 是方便包装现有的数据模型;它不会替换任何数据模型。

trans-unit.source: A data provider does not attempt to condense the complexity and versatility of a data model such as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ado](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ado-md.md)] into one single object with a few properties.
trans-unit.target: 数据提供程序不会尝试如紧缩的复杂程度和数据模型的通用性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ado](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ado-md.md)]到具有少数几个属性的单个对象。

trans-unit.source: DataSourceProvider is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceProvider 是一个抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the derived classes, which are <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 使用派生类，是<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.ObjectDataProvider></xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>之一

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceProvider is aware of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] threading and dispatcher model.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceProvider 已意识到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]线程处理和调度程序模型。

trans-unit.source: It assumes the thread at creation time to be the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: 它在创建时为假定线程[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]线程。

trans-unit.source: Events will get marshaled from a worker thread to the UI thread of the application.
trans-unit.target: 事件将从封送工作线程到应用程序的 UI 线程。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This is a protected constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是受保护的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that initialization of this object is about to begin; no implicit <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh*> occurs until the matched <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.EndInit*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示此初始化即将开始; 对象不隐式<> *1> 发生之前匹配<> *1> 调用方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this base class calls this method when <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad*> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh*> has been called.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，此基类调用此方法时<> *1> 或<> *1> 已调用。

trans-unit.source: The base class delays the call if refresh is deferred or initial load is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果刷新发生延迟或已禁用初始加载，则基类会延迟调用。

trans-unit.source: **Notes to Implementers:** You can choose to execute the query on the same thread or on a background thread or using `IsAsynchronous`.
trans-unit.target: **注意事項︰**可以选择以执行查询，在同一线程或后台线程或使用`IsAsynchronous`。

trans-unit.source: When the query is complete, call <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.OnQueryFinished%2A> to have the public properties updated.
trans-unit.target: 查询完成后，调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.OnQueryFinished%2A>具有更新的公共属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.OnQueryFinished%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying data object.
trans-unit.target: 获取基础数据对象。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> is used as the source of a binding, this is the resulting binding source object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>使用作为绑定源时，这是生成的绑定源对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Object> that is the underlying data object.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref:System.Object>，它是基础的数据对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*> property has a new value.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*>属性具有新值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*>

trans-unit.source: **Notes to implementers:** Raise this event when a new data object becomes available on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: **注意事項︰**引发此事件时，便可以在新的数据对象<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to change properties of the provider and delay automatic refresh.
trans-unit.target: 进入延迟循环，该循环可用于更改提供程序并延迟自动刷新的属性。

trans-unit.source: The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple property changes within the scope.
trans-unit.target: 典型用法就是创建`using`范围使用此方法，然后在范围内进行多个属性更改。

trans-unit.source: This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.
trans-unit.target: 这会延迟自动刷新，直到退出延迟循环循环。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IDisposable> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IDisposable>可用于释放调用对象的对象。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> object to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>对象传递给[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]线程使用。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> object to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread to use.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>对象传递给[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]线程使用。

trans-unit.source: By default, this is the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> object that is associated with the thread on which this instance was created.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这是<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>与在其创建此实例的线程关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the initialization of this object has completed; this causes a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh*> if no other <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*> is outstanding.
trans-unit.target: 指示此对象的初始化已完成;这将导致<> *1> 没有其他<> *1> 是未完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error of the last query operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取最新的查询操作的错误。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref:System.Exception> that is the error of the last query operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there was no error.
trans-unit.target: 类型的值<xref:System.Exception>，它是最新的查询操作，该错误或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有任何错误。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Starts the initial query to the underlying data model.
trans-unit.target: 启动对基础数据模型的初始查询。

trans-unit.source: The result is returned on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*> property.
trans-unit.target: 在返回的结果<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called by the binding engine when dependent data bindings are activated.
trans-unit.target: 在激活相关的数据绑定，此方法通常由绑定引擎中调用。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.IsInitialLoadEnabled%2A> to `false` to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.IsInitialLoadEnabled%2A>到`false`以防止或延迟的数据自动加载。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.IsInitialLoadEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InitialLoad method can be called multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 可以多次调用 InitialLoad 方法。

trans-unit.source: The provider ignores subsequent calls once it is busy executing the initial query; the provider does not restart an already running query when InitialLoad is called again.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序将忽略后续调用后正忙于执行初始查询;提供程序不会重新启动已在运行查询时再次调用 InitialLoad。

trans-unit.source: When the query finishes successfully, any InitialLoad call still does not re-query data.
trans-unit.target: 查询成功完成后，任何 InitialLoad 调用仍不重新查询数据。

trans-unit.source: The InitialLoad operation is typically asynchronous, a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property assumed a new value.
trans-unit.target: InitialLoad 操作通常是异步的<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>引发事件时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性采用新值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>

trans-unit.source: The application calls <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> to cause a refresh of the data.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>会导致的数据刷新。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否阻止或延迟自动加载数据。

trans-unit.source: Typically the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> runs its query and sets its <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property the first time it is used by a binding or a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>.
trans-unit.target: 通常<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>运行其查询并将其<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>第一次它由一种<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>或的绑定的属性</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>设置</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>

trans-unit.source: You can omit this step by setting the IsInitialLoadEnabled property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以忽略此步骤 IsInitialLoadEnabled 属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> to cause the provider to obtain its data.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，应用程序必须显式调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>导致要获取其数据的提供程序。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to prevent or delay the automatic loading of data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>若要避免或延迟的数据; 自动加载否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is an outstanding <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*> in use.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否存在某个未完成<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*>中使用。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*>

trans-unit.source: **Notes to implementers:** To get the best use out of refresh deferral, do not call <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> when this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: **注意事項︰**若要获得超出刷新延迟最佳使用，不要调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>当此属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is an outstanding <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*> in use; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果没有未完成<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*>中使用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.PropertyChanged"></xref> event with the provided arguments.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.PropertyChanged"></xref>通过提供的参数的事件。

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 要引发事件的参数。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类调用此方法以指示查询已完成。

trans-unit.source: This callback can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: 可以从任何线程调用此回调。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将封送回将结果发送到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]线程设置任何公共属性以及前引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: The data that is the result of the query.
trans-unit.target: 正在查询的结果数据。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes call this method to indicate that a query has finished.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类调用此方法以指示查询已完成。

trans-unit.source: This callback can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: 可以从任何线程调用此回调。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marshals back the result to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread before setting any of the public properties and before raising any events.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将封送回将结果发送到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]线程设置任何公共属性以及前引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: The data that is the result of the query.
trans-unit.target: 正在查询的结果数据。

trans-unit.source: The error that occurred while running the query.
trans-unit.target: 在运行查询时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: This value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no error.
trans-unit.target: 此值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有错误。

trans-unit.source: Optional delegate that is used to execute completion work on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread, for example, to set additional properties.
trans-unit.target: 用于执行完成工作的可选委托[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]线程，例如，若要设置其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Optional arguments to send as a parameter with the `completionWork` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 可选自变量将作为一个参数，并且发送`completionWork`委托。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a refresh operation to the underlying data model.
trans-unit.target: 启动到基础数据模型的刷新操作。

trans-unit.source: The result is returned on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*> property.
trans-unit.target: 在返回的结果<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data*>

trans-unit.source: A refresh operation is typically asynchronous, a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event is raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property assumed a new value.
trans-unit.target: 刷新操作通常是异步的<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>引发事件时<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性采用新值。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the refresh operation fails, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A> property is set to `null`; the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Error%2A> property is set with the error exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果刷新操作失败，<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>属性设置为`null`;<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Error%2A>属性设置使用的错误异常。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Error%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application can call Refresh while a previous refresh is still underway.
trans-unit.target: 上次刷新仍在进行时，应用程序可以调用刷新。

trans-unit.source: Calling Refresh twice raises the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged> event twice.
trans-unit.target: 两次调用刷新引发<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>事件两次。</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DataChanged>

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。
